alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 2:58PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Barnstable and central Plymouth Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 258 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Halifax, or 7 miles east of Bridgewater, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, brief heavy rain and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Bridgewater, Brewster, Middleborough, Pembroke, Duxbury, East Bridgewater, Kingston, Carver, Hanson, Halifax, Orleans, Eastham, Plympton, Wellfleet and Truro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
